item.title: Testing Your Infallibleness - Part 1
item.description: Audience: System Admin, Self taught coder, Computer Scientist Summary: How to leverage puppet-retrospec to generate your puppet unit test suite Time Involved: 10 minutes How many of you remember when the spell checker first came out? It had such a huge impact in everyones life because instantly everyone who used the spell checker appeared as if they had won the international spelling bee. How long did it take you to switch from looking up every single word in a paper dictionary to simply right clicking on a word?
